StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetScheduleHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int AS
SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), MS.PROCESSING_DATE, 106) AS PROCESSING_DATE, MOL.MEPS_NAME, COALESCE(MS.ASVAB, SPACE(0)) AS ASVAB, COALESCE(MS.SPECIAL_EXAM, SPACE(0)) AS SPECIAL_EXAM, COALESCE(MS.COMPLETE_PHYSICAL, SPACE(0)) AS COMPLETE_PHYSICAL, COALESCE(MS.INSPECTION_PHYSICAL, SPACE(0)) AS INSPECTION_PHYSICAL, COALESCE(MS.CONSULTATION_PHYSICAL, SPACE(0)) AS CONSULTATION_PHYSICAL, COALESCE(MS.CONTRACT, SPACE(0)) AS CONTRACT, COALESCE(MS.SHIP, SPACE(0)) AS SHIP, COALESCE(MS.OTHER_PROCESSING, SPACE(0)) AS OTHER_PROCESSING, PS.PROCESSING_STATUS_DESCRIPTION, MS.SCHEDULE_ID, MS.SPECIAL_EXAM_TYPE, C.CONSULTATION_TYPE_DESCRIPTION, --- ADDITIONAL MEPS SCHEDULE DATA COALESCE(MS.LODGING_REQUIRED, SPACE(0)) AS LODGING_REQUIRED, COALESCE(MS.PROCESSING_NOTES, SPACE(0)) AS PROCESSING_NOTES, COALESCE(MS.LAST_PROCESSED_FOR, SPACE(0)) AS LAST_PROCESSED_FOR, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(11), MS.ARRIVAL_DATE, 106), SPACE(0)) AS ARRIVAL_DATE, COALESCE(MS.TRANSPORTATION_REQUIRED, SPACE(0)) AS TRANSPORTATION_REQUIRED, COALESCE(CS.STATUS_TYPE, SPACE(0)) AS STATUS_TYPE FROM PROCESSING_STATUS PS INNER JOIN MEPS_SCHEDULE MS ON (PS.PROCESSING_STATUS_CODE = MS.PROCESSING_STATUS AND MS.NWA_ID = @NWAID) INNER JOIN MEPS_ORGANIZATION_LOOKUP MOL ON MS.MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID = MOL.MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON (CS.NWA_ID = MS.NWA_ID AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = dbo.GetMaxStatusID(CS.NWA_ID)) LEFT OUTER JOIN CONSULTATION C ON MS.CONSULTATION_TYPE = C.CONSULTATION_TYPE ORDER BY MS.PROCESSING_DATE DESC, MS.SCHEDULE_ID DESC
